name: eeanv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Distribute a pair of existential quantifiers over a conjunction. Combination of ~ 19.41v and ~ 19.42v . For a version requiring fewer axioms but with additional disjoint variable conditions, see ~ exdistrv . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.)
